title: Support bidi isolation for elements with dir attributes, and for bdi
body: This is a specific request for Edge to support bidi isolation per the HTML specification where the dir attribute and the bdi element are used.  The wording in the request for dir=auto [1] is equally valid here.

comments.body: Although the W3C and the HTML spec recommend the use of markup rather than CSS for managing text direction for RTL scripts, it would also be good to support unicode-bidi: isolate.
